mêre mare ≠ male mule

𒈬 MUˡ male

𒉢 NU nü ≠ نر nar ⇔ nan 男

𒉢 duri ⇔ dura virile #zikaru "male"

𒉢 pil₆ "male" <> 𒌓 PIR BIR₂ 𒎕 PI 𒌓 PIRIĜ2 bright
